String.string:
Receive 40 Guardian Mission rewards.

Activate Guardian Mode on the top left of the World Map (shortcut 'M'), and the button 'Arborea Guardian Missions [Track]' will appear at the bottom of the map. Click on the button to join a Guardian mission.

It is recommended that many Guardians take part in a rare Guardian mission (blue).

If the Guardian mission has already been completed in the Guardian Legion Mission Zone, you can either take part in another mission or switch channels to take part in the same Guardian mission.
